kr.dogfoot.hwplib.org.apache.poi.poifs.filesystem

Class NPOIFSMiniStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • kr.dogfoot.hwplib.org.apache.poi.poifs.filesystem.BlockStore
      • kr.dogfoot.hwplib.org.apache.poi.poifs.filesystem.NPOIFSMiniStore

  • public class NPOIFSMiniStore
extends BlockStore
    This class handles the MiniStream (small block store) in the NIO case for NPOIFSFileSystem
